name: Buffalo Deviled Eggs
author: klouddweller
summary: Easter with a kick! Every year I make deviled eggs, and this year I wanted to try something new. This is my own creation; a good balance of richness and zesty flavor! Garnish with Buffalo wing sauce and paprika.
ingredients: 8  hard-boiled eggs, halved lengthwise with yolks and whites separated
1 tablespoon hot Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's® REDHOT Buffalo Wing Sauce), or to taste
2 tablespoons finely grated Cheddar cheese, or more to taste
directions: Beat egg yolks, celery, yogurt, Anaheim pepper, mayonnaise, mustard, Buffalo wing sauce, garlic salt, onion powder, black pepper, and paprika together in a bowl with a fork until mixture is creamy and smooth
Place egg white halves on a platter
Spoon egg yolk mixture evenly into egg white halves
